CustomField.description:
This formula field is used in the Escalation Notification Email Template to show the number of Calendar Days that is associated to the different Change Request levels
CRM-Enhanced Cases for Change Request Functionality (C Reinecke 2010/08)
CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Change_Request_Level__c) ,"1. Minor - Look & Feel", 14, "2. Minor - Business Development", 30,"3. Minor - IT Development",60,"4. Major - IT Development",60,0)
CustomField.label: Change Request Escalation Days
